long_description: Clean, deodorize and sanitize your favorite leather, fabric and synthetic sandals with the Nikwax Sandal Wash. Easy to use, sponge-on cleaner freshens sandals and removes funky odors. Nikwax Sandal Wash works well on leather, fabric, synthetic, cork rubber and plastic sandals and footbeds; not for use on waterproof footwear. Extends sandal life by removing damaging bacteria that can rot the material. Environmentally safe product is not tested on animals and contains no propellant gases or fluorocarbons. Test on hidden area first as color may run.
short_description: Clean, deodorize and sanitize your favorite leather, fabric and synthetic sandals with the Nikwax Sandal Wash.
